name: GUAR_PMT_SCORE_REPL
description: This table contains information for the HB and PB Guarantor Payment Score Items.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: HB_SCORE
columns.description: The guarantor's hospital billing payment history score.

columns.name: HB_SCORE_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the guarantor was most recently scored.

columns.name: PB_SCORE
columns.description: The guarantor's professional billing payment history score.

columns.name: PB_SCORE_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the guarantor was most recently scored.
